website_summaries.verdict: Kodak's Pixpro AZ401 camera gives you a lot of zoom power for not a lot of money, but image quality and performance are disappointing.
cons: Image quality suffers at moderate ISOs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a warehouse deal and am amazed at how good it is. On reading about how it uses batteries quickly, I also bought some rechargeable ones at the same time but haven’t had a problem. The images are clear and the camera fits my needs although I’m no expert. Surprised at how effective the zoom is although a tripod helps to stabilise the image in lost instances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorely Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough camera to use, so no problems there. The downfall, It came with no memory card of worth, it stores about six frames and complains memory is then short. It refuses to connect to a laptop, and is therefore more or less useless for downloading images. Presumably it works best with a Kodak printer. Will never purchase another Kodak camera. Give me an Olympus every time, which is slick to use in combo with a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Howarth

customer_reviews.title: You will also need a battery recharger and SD card if buying this camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter (8) with her birthday and pocket money. First camera for her nature walks. Fine from that point of view. But I would reiterate comments from other reviewers that you will need to purchase a battery recharger and a bag full of rechargeable AA batteries. The camera has had 15-20 minutes of 'on' time on its first couple of uses before dieing. Come on Kodak - you can design a better power system than that. Likewise with the camera's internal storage - half a dozen photos at most. SD card is also mandatory if buying this camera - so factor that into your purchase budget.
customer_reviews.author: S A TODD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle once you've  got used to it
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera for the money, iam still getting to grips with it at moment, but iam impressed so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to focus I delete more photos than I keep I keep trying things it is not getting better would have been a good idea to give you a instruction book with the camera it cost enough a bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mr L May

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 📷
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera the picture is brilliant my daughter wanted professional camera for her birthday she 11 and loves taking pictures of nature and animals, scenery, amazing capures she loves it well worth the money.. I'm buying another one for my mum for her holiday travels 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Nicola lee

customer_reviews.title: A professional camera!
customer_reviews.text: Although no manual available for this model, the manual for it's nearest equivalent, the AZ365, tells you everything you need to know Love the zoom feature, my camera stand fits it. At the moment I'm using it on auto but will explore all its features later!
customer_reviews.author: rona

customer_reviews.title: Good, but very hungry for batteries
customer_reviews.text: This is a quite good camera. Photos are beautiful, clear, even at 40X; however, the downfall is batteries, which last just a few shots (approximately 15) and then need to be changed. Each round consumes 4 batteries. All in all, it's a good and sad product, because it takes nice photos, but drains batteries extremely fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Anghel

customer_reviews.title: The moon’s the limit
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my first picture of the moon using this camera, no tripod just point and shoot with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing zoom
customer_reviews.text: Zoom is amazing and clear (if you have sturdy hand) I was able to get video of caterpillars on a plant from 2nd floor. But she you make shuterspeed too high (quick) than the picture comes out black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So bad
customer_reviews.text: Unreal ! Got it yesterday new battery... took five pics and the battery was all gone !!!! Return
customer_reviews.author: jesabel noslier

product_meta.title: Kodak PIXPRO Astro Zoom AZ401-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 40X Optical Zoom and 3" LCD (Black)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Black| Style Name:SingleIntroducing the new Kodak PIXPRO AZ401 digital camera from our Astro zoom collection. A 40x Ultra long zoom lens with optical image stabilization delivers crisp, clear 16 Megapixel close-ups, 180 Degree Panorama or HD videos with the switch of a button. Object tracking, post-editing features and a host of powerful yet intuitive settings make photography with this Camera effortless, entertaining and frustration-free. Kodak PIXPRO digital cameras - tell your story.
feature_bullets: You’ll get well defined, detailed images thanks to the AZ401’s 16 million pixels. That’s ample resolution to crop, zoom, or enlarge your photos however the photographer in you desires.
With a 24mm wide angle lens, there’s no sacrificing what you want in the frame. So go ahead and let your camera see what you see - The sky’s the limit!
The optical image stabilization will iron out any small movements as you’re focused on getting your shot, so you never have to be afraid to go for what you want.
Whether you’re in the moment, or modifying your work at a later time, the bright, 3” LCD screen ensures that you end up with just what you’re looking for.
Capture everything in your peripherals with the 180 Degree Panorama feature
The az401 takes a standard SD/SDHC memory card that is at least Class 4 and no larger than 32GB
The az401 is not compatible with Micro SD, micro/adapter, Ultra, Ultra plus, Extreme, extreme Plus, Extreme Pro, or SDXC cards

specifications.Included Components: Warranty Card, Service Card, Camera, Neck Strap, AA Battery
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars241 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
